Red Ribbon Club

1. The Primary motto of RRC is to guide and develop the youth of India. RRC is effectively involved in creating awareness among the public and especially among the youth regarding the spreading of HIV and its effects on the society.

2. RRC is also actively involved in personality development activities among the college students to enhance their personality.

3. It educates the youth regarding sex related problems. RRC regularly conducts programmes to promote physical as well as psychological health among the youth.
